attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This so called “app” took SO LONG to even download. Don’t even get my started on the graphics like it’s just disgusting🤢. When I first went into the app it was playing absolutely terrible music. This app needs to be deleted ASAP. There’s nothing good about it and it’s not even good it’s just not it.

attributes.title: Take it down
attributes.review: This app has logged into my personal information and my phone went *glitch* after and my phone shut off and I looked into my setting and it said trump app assessing my PERSONAL data. I hope this app is removed and no one else gets hacked my trumps RACHET data base. 🤬✌🏼

attributes.title: The worst app
attributes.review: This app is Terrible if I could give it zero stars I would. This app to weeks to download and wouldn’t let me stop it from downloading. The app then caused my phone to glitch. It used up my battery life quickly and some of the apps on my phone got deleted.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I opened the open it was fine the first few seconds but then Barron trump came through the screen and I was happy UNTIL it was Donald trump with a mask of barrons face and then he coughed on me and proceeded to open a jar of cockroaches and set the free on my house. After that he went back into my phone before sl*t shamming me

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This took 5 weeks to download and I hade to give personal info that I feel uncomfortable sharing and I also hate all the pictures there is no point and I do not think the app is very family friendly or helps me with anything

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app i was expecting for it to be to help make america great again. all it did was make it worst. i first opened the app and it gave me cancer of the eye to see nasty white things. this app is HORRIBLE do not get it. this app is also a scam it will get your cards hacked

attributes.title: My cat is now dead
attributes.review: So at first I downloaded this app and it was great! Then a month later, Trump supporters started appearing and watching my house and then one day they all started chanting “VOTE FOR TRUMP OR ELSE” I started yelling “VOTE ANY SUITABLE ADULT!” And then they stormed my house and killed anything living. THIS IS TERRIBLE. My cat is dead!! I hid in time but my cat didn’t so now, I don’t have a cat. Thanks Trump.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review:
This app has caused many troubles in my life I personally have gotten a virus on my cellphone because of this app and it was very annoying to have and look at, very disrespectful and horrible app.

                                   I would totally NOT RECOMMEND TO ANYONE UNLESS YOU WANNA BE MEAN AND ANNOYING! 
                                    Thank you for your time

attributes.title: do NOT get this app❤️
attributes.review: yesterday, only 69 minutes after downloading this app a ginormous Cheeto man appear banging at my door thank goodness i didn’t open it bc this morning on the news i saw that this very app had been send these cheeto men to peoples houses and kidnapping them to help support our orange killer president in the torturing of kids in ICE camps🥰

attributes.title: PLS DONT DOWNLOAD: CONTAINS VIRUS
attributes.review: only got this app to see what the hype was about AND IT IS AWFUL. After i downloaded and noticed my phone was running noticeably slower. I begin to get random Trump pop-up ads when I have no applications open at all. This app installed a virus into my phone gives me very inappropriate ads. DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU ARE WILLING TO PURCHASE A WHOLE NEW PHONE.
